What's This?

The Stubborn Lovers / Bio

« Back to Profile

The Stubborn Lovers are a five or six-piece alt-country band from Portland, Oregon with current and former members of Wow & Flutter, Ruby Feathers and Outer Space Heaters among its ranks.

Instrumentation includes acoustic, electric and steel guitars, electric bass, drums and vocals, with a sound in the vein of Lucinda Williams, Whiskeytown, Neko Case, Wilco, etc...

General Info

Band Members:
Katie Fagan - vocals/guitar; Jenny Taylor - bass; Andy MacMillan - electric guitar; Steve Lipsey - steel guitars; Michael Nelson - drums; Mandy Allan - Vocals
Artist Name:
The Stubborn Lovers
Home Page:
http://www.reverbnation.com/thestubbornlovers
Active Since:
06/13
Genres:
Americana / Alt Country / Roots

Contact Info

Location:
Portland, OR
